trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There was one other sighting in Seattle on or around May 29th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Glowing orb of yellowish orangish light.
divs: sighting detailsim reporting this for my mom and sister and also a family friend who witnessed this from her own house so i cant give perfect descriptions. my mom and sister were looking at the moon at about 11:25 (looking toward the west\northwest) when they noticed a glowing yellow-orangish ball of light that seemed to be on fire started heading towards our house slowly then took a sharp turn toward the southwest heading towards downtown or west seattle then the light got dimmer and went out in a timeframe of about ten minutes. my mom described it saying that it "hurt to look at, but i couldnt take my eyes off it" noting she was freaked out by the unnatural behavior. our family friend watched the object in the same way as my mom and sister. she watched this "object" go towards the southwest with her binoculars, but couldnt make out a shape.
